# TSPS - 2.3 Business Consultant - Senior
## Tender Information

### Reference Number
cb-8446-10626189

### Amendment Number
1

### Solicitation Number
S24-20230352

### Publication Date
2023-08-24

### Tender Closing Date
2023-09-08T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-09-18

### Expected Contract End Date
2024-03-31

### Tender Status
Expired - The tender has closed and evaluation of responses is complete.

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

### Procurement Category
Services (SRV)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Description
The Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) requires a Contractor to provide policy advice and support services for the Corporate Strategy and Performance division, specifically for managing privacy protection and implementing SSHRC’s privacy program. The services will cover policy development, planning, and implementation.

### Unspsc
80101500 - Business and corporate management consultation services

### Regions of Opportunity
- National Capital Region (NCR)

### Regions of Delivery
Canada

### Regions of Interest
The Contract will provide services for the administration and Corporate Strategy and Performance division.

### GOVERNMENT CONTRACT INFORMATION
#### Protecting your Personal Information

T - 125 Eddy Street
 suites 5001
Ottawa ON K1A 0A6

<https://www.canada.ca/en/privy-council/information_INITIALIZATION/document/francais;>
